score

private int score(int handtype,
                  int[] hand,
                  int[] locked,
                  int[] lockedsets,
                  int[] bonus,
                  int windoftheround,
                  int playerwind)
Scores a winning hand

Parameters:
hand - the concealed tiles
locked - the open tiles
lockedsets - int[] array representing which sets the open tiles comprise
windoftheround - the wind of the round
playerwind - the player's own wind
Returns:
the number of points this winning hand has

getBestPattern

private int[] getBestPattern(int handtype,
                             TilePattern[] potentialpatterns,
                             TilePattern locked,
                             int[] lockedsets,
                             int[] bonus,
                             int windoftheround,
                             int playerwind)
determines the best pattern that can be made with the concealed tiles in a hand

Parameters:
handtype - either WINNER or NORMAL
potentialpatterns - TilePattern[] array representing the set of all possible ways to combine the hand tiles
locked - the face-up tiles
lockedsets - int[] array representing which sets the open tiles comprise
windoftheround - the wind of the round
playerwind - the player's own wind
Returns:
the best scoring pattern from the bunch to go for

scorePotential

public int scorePotential(TilePattern potentialpattern,
                          int windoftheround,
                          int playerwind)
Determines how much this pattern is worth, point wise, were a player to go out on it.

Parameters:
potentialpattern - the potential "win" pattern
windoftheround - the wind of the round
playerwind - the player's own wind
Returns:
the score this pattern would receive
